title: Team Iron Looking for Jungle/Top Plat3+

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Team Iron (@TeamIronEsports). No Doubt! No Fear! Australian Esports organisation. Follow for the latest updates on the team!. Australia

body:
Team Iron Is looking for dedicated players for open ladder 2017 to break into challenger series.


Requirements:

* Platinum 3 and above
* Working Mic
* Stable reliable internet
* Fluent in English
* Discord
* Dedicated (were in for the long haul)
* 18 years +

Send us a DM on our Twitter or leave a comment on this thread or add BreakVG on League of Legends 

Good luck to all applicants.

replies.body:
Hello,

I play mostly Top and Support and was able to climb to plat 2 on 2 separate accounts (this one and Nelsonas)
I have not been playing for the last 6 months as I recently arrived in Australia (this is why my accounts are gold 1). 

I have been looking to play LoL competitively for awhile now, and I know it would not take me much time to return to form.  I would be willing to take some time off from Uni/work if the team is able to break into the OPL. The best way to contact me is via email at nicknelson3@gmail.com.

Requirements:
Plat 3 and above: I reached plat 2 on 2 NA accounts. I believe if I had playing exclusively on one I would have reached Diamond+
Working mic: I have a razer kraken headset
Stable reliable internet: Internet through telstra
Fluent in english: Native language
Discord: Have an account, willing to familiarize myself with it.
Dedicated: If I am the right fit for the team I am willing to dedicate myself for the long haul.
18 yr plus: I am 25
